RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: I am a currently doctoral student in Meteorology at the National Institute for Space Research - INPE. In this same institution I had the opportunity to Attend my Masters in meteorology under the supervise of the Doctor Manoel Alonso Gan, during the period from 2010 to 2012. I got my graduate degree in Meteorology at the Federal University of Pelotas (2009/01). I was a fellow group-PET Meteorology (Tutorial Education Program) for 2 years and 11 months.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Has experience in Geosciences, focusing on Geosciences

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Bolsista Programa de Educao Tutorial (PET-SESU). Desenvolvimento de projetos de ensino, pesquisa e extenso universitria. As atividades desenvolvidas pelo grupo de 12 bolsistas tem como foco atingir a comunidade cientfica e a sociedade em um contexto geral.
A estagiria ministrou e preparou aulas, para a disciplina de Instrumentao Meteorolgica e Tcnicas de Observao II (IMTO II), sob orientacao do professor Doutor Paulo roberto Pelufo Foster.
